logentry.author: leem
logentry.msg: Fix the hazard image selection equality implementation to ensure that identical images do actually compare equal, previously they was comparing false and showing the property text in bold when opening the property browser for the first time on a term.

logentry.author: leem
logentry.msg: Fault: 52 Add a validation check that an image has been set before allowing any changes to be saved.

logentry.author: leem
logentry.msg: Code tidy

logentry.author: leem
logentry.msg: Correct the handing of marking a non-working dates term as the default to actually make it so what it's supposed to

logentry.author: leem
logentry.msg: Fault: 58 Handle IS_DEFAULT_VALUE being NULL rather than crashing by treating NULL as false when loading library data.

logentry.author: leem
logentry.msg: Fix a crash where the standard comments library wasn't using the correct type for the comment text in order to edit it.

logentry.author: leem
logentry.msg:
Fault: 159 Adjust PVT003SelectCommentDets and PVT003SelectComment to allow a configurable max comment length to be specificed.
Adjust calling code in sys libs for the event description in activities and standard comments to pass in the desired max length for each.

logentry.msg: Fault: 130 Correct how the database connection details are shown in the status bar to bring them in line with the .NET app standards

logentry.msg: Some more updates to the Create Work List. Updated the algorithm for work list position algorithm to take the initial instrument position. Made some changes to CreateWorklist method and WorkListInstrPositionDataSet to deal with the selected and unselected QC Lots. Some other changes that i can't recall and still to do some preference stuff as it finishes off.
